org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.flow.mdui

Class AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.flow.mdui.AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetadataResolverAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicMetadataResolverAdapter, StaticMetadataResolverAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetadataResolverAdapter
    This is AbstractMetadataResolverAdapter that encapsulates commons between static and dynamic resolvers.
    Since:
    4.1.0
